longtext.content: three and a half ounces of smoky bacon half a pound of ground beef half a pound of ground pork one onion a stalk of celery and one carrot two tablespoons of tomato paste three tablespoons of olive oil three and a half tablespoons of butter one glass of whole milk one glass of red wine and a cup of beef stock and some pepper and salt spaghetti three and a half ounces for each serving
longtext.label: Preparation of Ingredients
longtext.step_assignment_explanation: This segment covers the initial step of gathering and preparing all the necessary ingredients for the recipe.

IngredientDetail.label: Ingredient Detail
IngredientDetail.explanation: The narration provides precise measurements and specifies the types of ingredients required, such as 'three and a half ounces of smoky bacon' and 'one glass of red wine', enabling accurate replication of the recipe.

CookingTechniqueExplanation.label: Cooking Technique Explanation
CookingTechniqueExplanation.explanation: The narration lists ingredients but does not elaborate on the cooking techniques to be used with these ingredients, assuming some level of preexisting knowledge or leaving room for interpretation.

PersonalizationEngagement.label: Personalization & Engagement
PersonalizationEngagement.explanation: This narration is straightforward and focuses solely on the ingredients list without incorporating personal anecdotes, expressions, or any form of personal engagement.

HealthNutritionFocus.label: Health & Nutrition Focus
HealthNutritionFocus.explanation: Health and nutrition are not explicitly addressed in the narration. The focus is on the recipe ingredients without mentioning their health aspects or nutritional values.

CulinaryStyle.label: Culinary Style
CulinaryStyle.explanation: The ingredients listed, such as smoky bacon, ground beef, and olive oil, suggest a traditional culinary style rather than an innovative or alternative approach to cooking.

longtext.content: grind 500 grams of beef peel wash and fine dice 150 grams of onion 200 grams of carrots and 200 grams of celery stalks peel 500 grams of tomatoes use a sharp knife and make a crosswise incision place in boiling water for one minute and shock and ice water remove the skins and dice the tomatoes

longtext.content: here on a gas I put lovely saucepan and for some lovely pancetta two nice big fat slice of a pancetta which is slice it small slices and it's a small one and a half it should be okay oh yeah that give a lovely lovely fantastic flavor I need olive oil a couple of spoon not olive oil make sure is extra virgin olive oil I need a 25 gram of a butter here I have 1 carrot 1 stalk of celery and 1 medium onion

longtext.content: first and foremost we will need some nutrition and health guidelines from reputable sources... we will also need some wholesome ingredients the major health institutions recommend that we use ingredients there are low in saturated fats and free of trans fats then we use unrefined complex sources or carbohydrates that we use lean sources of protein and that we include lots of fiber rich non-starchy vegetables
